all.body:
Hey Ari,

I'd love to get together for lunch and discuss your proposal for FullStack.io. It looks good, I'd love to see what it looks like in the future

Joel
all.subject: Proposal

all.body: Rad! Lets meetup at 8pm, work for you?
all.subject: Dinner tonight

all.body:
Hi Ari,

Chris Molozian just sent you a 1-1 message but you're idle:

[9:25 AM] Chris Molozian: i'd like to get your advice on how to approach this infrastructure issue I'm having


---
To change your notification preferences: https://www.hipchat.com/account/notifications.
This message was intended for writeari@gmail.com. If this was in error,
please contact us (https://www.hipchat.com/contact) or opt out
(https://www.hipchat.com/opt_out?email=writeari%40gmail.com&token=6546e7f06910b6b79958445f3f456143bf0889d2&src=email_oto_message_notification).
all.subject: Chris Molozian sent you a 1-1 message

all.body:
Thanks for the feedback, I will take your approach to rewriting the pitch,
as well as clarifying who I am writing for. I struggle on "showing" in my
pitch writing; my show writing makes the writing longer and more awkward.

Mathieu
all.subject: Re: [30x500] Pitch Review: Automatic Web API Documentation Testing Tool/Service/Something
